price: Hivi ndivyo Mwenyezi Mungu anavyo piga muhuri kwenye nyoyo za wasio jua.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
